###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlToolbar_EnableButton

###Description###
Enables or disables the specified button

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiToolBar.au3>
_GUICtrlToolbar_EnableButton($hWnd, $iCommandID[, $fEnable = True])

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to the control
$iCommandID
	Button command ID
$fEnable
	Enable flag:
		 True - Button will be enabled
		False - Button will be disabled
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: True
Failure: False

###Remarks###
None.

###Related###
_GUICtrlToolbar_HideButton
